website_summaries.verdict: This kids karaoke machine is a good system for young children over the age of three, as it is easy to use. It has plenty of features so your child won't get bored with it anytime soon.
pros: We like that this karaoke machine comes with two microphones, allowing your children to sing together
It also has an applause function and plenty of lights to make your child feel like a star
cons: The karaoke machine presents a choking hazard to children under age three
It is also battery operated, which limits its run time

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED FOR ITS QUALITY.. forst of all its ...
customer_reviews.text: OVERPRICED FOR ITS QUALITY.. forst of all its cheaply made, very cheap plastic and microphone stand doesnt stay put in extended position..Microphones barely work. My daughter had to put her lips on it to make it work but after little while *1week* it completely stopped working. only music & clap sounds are working properly right now. I was going to send it back but my daughter wants to keep it. Very dissapointed. Overpriced for its quality
customer_reviews.author: Merve

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve started a fire
customer_reviews.text: Product was bought for Christmas and my kids loved it. Then today ( April 12) my husband started to smell electronic burning....and it was this. We opened it up and found the electronic components melting! So unsafe! The arrows in picture show you what burned!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: 3yr old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big hit! It was bought for my 3yr old and she loves it. Her 2 big sisters also use it, ages 5 and 7. Having 2 microphones helps so much because it can be easily shared. It was easy to put together, the AUX-in cord option is awesome, and the music beats and clapping sounds give my 3yr old free range to create her own songs, which she does very well. It is decently built considering the reasonable price. Happy to have purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: CBrackett

customer_reviews.title: but the over all quality and sound quality are just terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning this item and purchasing a REAL karaoke machine for a lower price. I first chose this item because it’s kid friendly, but the over all quality and sound quality are just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, however only one microphone worked
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, however only one microphone worked....so frustrating that we should have to check everything before we give it for a gift!! Now that I read the reviews there seems to be many issues depending which item you get. Wonder how long the last microphone will work? Sadly we kept it because she wouldn't part with it??
customer_reviews.author: Dee Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Happy niece, miserable sister, job well done for funcle.
customer_reviews.text: I set out to buy my niece, the apple of my eye, and the social butterfly in our family a birthday gift that would let her create a stage anywhere she likes... and to irritate the shit out of my sister cuz I love her too. Mission accomplished. My niece loves it my sister hates it and tried to leave it at my mother's house for visits 3 times. I made sure though that it was packed up in the car to go to its forever home. All is well and the funcle reigns supreme.
customer_reviews.author: solemn1

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say this but I am disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say this but I am disappointed with this product. I should have returned it, but too much trouble to do so. Although I realize this is for children, I should have purchased something that worked so we could all hear my granddaughter's voice when she sings into the microphone. Unfortunately, that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: RCM

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would work like a real mic (i
customer_reviews.text: The karaoke machine is really cute but you have to litterally put your mouth on the mic for it to work (which makes it hard for anyone to share it, unless you clean it every time). I wish it would work like a real mic (i.e. you can hold the mic a few inches away from your mouth and it would still work).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live double microphone
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed. Would never buy or suggest buying. Unfortunately bought it early for Christmas so by the time it was opened it was too late to return. Ut is nothing bit two microphones that you can barely hear yourself sing. Im not sure how they very by calling it karaoke!!!!! The us nothing karaoke about it. I have bought little microphones at Walgreens that were much more impressive than this. Complete waste of money. Kids don't enjoy our play with. BIG WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kneidl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and children's toy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for kids of all age! My niece loves singing to a lot of different songs so this works out great. May not work great for her parents who have lost sleep from the singing but if you are an uncle like me this is great!! The product is really sturdy and the microphones are pretty well built. It allows you to plug your MP3 in so you can play music from your MP3 player for your kids to sing along to. It comes with two microphone so friends can join in! This definitely does a lot of fun and i recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: FieryXeph

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter asked for a Karaoke machine for Christmas, along with other things on her list. She was very surprised to open it Christmas Eve night and see that she actually got one. She has been very happy with it and plays it on the weekends with her family and friends. I love that it is adjustable and the light flash which gives it a sense of really performing for an audience.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We all love it, but especially my grandsons who love to sing and dance. It's the perfect height for young kids and the sound is pretty good. I gave it as a Christmas gift and it's still going strong (February), and they have not grown tired of it. Can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy E Collins

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week - sound quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my three year old daughter. Seemed like it was the right mix of feature for a toddler trying to have some fun, including and aux Jack to pipe in music over the speaker. Unfortunately, it is not worth the money - speaker quality is terrible and it broke within a week.
customer_reviews.author: D. Font

customer_reviews.title: Awesome works pricey son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2-year-old is obsessed with singing and loves his new microphone I would definitely say $50 was pretty steep for this particular product because it is plastic and not super super well-made but it makes my son happy so it’s worth every penny .... Remember if you have an iPhone that you need to have the iPhone adapter for regular non apple headphones for the USB to work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great. Mics not the best. Great features.
customer_reviews.text: Kids like love it. I love that there’s two mics so they aren’t fighting over it. I really enjoy all of its features. The only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because one mic immediately started to cut out. And you have to almost put your mouth on it for it to pick up the sounds. I just decided to purchase replacement mics instead of trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. DonutChute

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids stand up microphone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My daughters love it so much! (4 & 7) I gifted it to my nieces who also love it. There is a audio jack which we used to plug into our karaoke machine. The foot pedals are very easy for little kids to use and get instant applause from their “audience”
customer_reviews.author: heathersbutterfly24

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Marketing -- blame Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is just a dual microphone set, with a few built in songs. It even says that in the description. The problem -- "Frequently Bought Together" includes several Karaoke discs. This machine cannot use them. Another, real karaoke could, and conceivably this machine could be plugged into that. But the implication is that the two products go together -- and they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Greiner

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SHORT AUXILIARY CORD
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this especially since there are 2 microphones and you can plug it into a phone to project songs to sing along to. I just wish the Auxiliary cord was either longer (it’s super short) or it would work with other Auxiliary cords (it won’t). the sound isn’t “professional” by any means but it is a kids toy and the girls don’t seem to be affected by it and it’s very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and annoying
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but it’s over priced. Microphones work but poor sound quality. The choice of musical songs are horrible. Annoying beat an it should turn off after 30 seconds not 2 minutes. I already have a headache. Music should be fun not annoying!!! 5 minutes after I posted this downgraded to 2 stars. The music should not play for 2minuted straight!!! Parents worst nightmare. Beware
customer_reviews.author: zen

customer_reviews.title: For what we got it for its perfect -- my daughter wanted a microphone (she's 5) she ...
customer_reviews.text: For what we got it for its perfect -- my daughter wanted a microphone (she's 5) she has a 3 yr old sister -- she loves it - I use an audio cable and plug in our amazon echo and she can stream whatever she wants. The quality of sound is bad but honestly thats kind of a bonus for us - it stays in her room and we don't hear it much in the family room but she has a blast :)
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable toy with a couple of drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Great item for younger kids. It appears to be durable as it has withstood a month of play with some active two and four year-olds. I wish it was a little louder and included an AC power adapter instead of just batteries. I like the little foot petals that play music or applause noises. The kids have learned to press the applause sound after their performances. Lots of fun so far.
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Still works great almost 2 years later!
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to our 4yr old grandson almost 2 years ago, & he still enjoys singing his heart out with this karaoke mic! It's truly adorable to watch him perform! The sound quality isn't the best, but it's loud enough to hear him singing pretty clearly. The price is great for endless hours of family fun! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: gg&pops

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed by this product for 49
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by this product for 49.99. The idea is great but issues are 1) Only 1 microphone seems to work. The other is "just for show"; 2) As soon as you turn it on you get annoying music that you cannot turn off. Most of the time you want to use it for your child to sing into the microphone, not to hear that annoying song 3) Biggest issue is the sound. You can barely hear the singing unless you put your mouth right onto the microphone and even then just barely.
customer_reviews.author: DH Walters

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!!
customer_reviews.text: WE havent used the AUX hookup just yet, but from the moment my two little ones (4yr old daughter and 8 year old son) seen it, THey have been sanging and performing for me every since.LOL! Expect loud singing but a house full of joy with this Karoake Machine. The lights and double mic was a brilliant idea. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lakina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: I know there are more elaborate karaoke machines you can get, but this one is one that my 2 year old granddaughter is daughter is capeable of using all on her own. It's very simple. The volume is also good without being so loud as to not get complaints from the neighbors or make the dogs howl.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews for this product, this is essentially a cheap microphone that transmits at mediocre quality. I can’t believe for this quality they charge $50 which is why I returned it. I would rather spend a little more and get a professional set.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Buy something better
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble out of the box, but the quality is garbage. The speaker loudness can barely be heard over the kids singing and they aren't singing that loud. The preloaded music is just a jingle that doesn't have any words to it and not a recognizable song. Don't waste your money. I put 2 stars because at worst it can be a prop for what should be a karaoke machine, and perhaps some parents will opt for a non amplified kid's singing sound... however the kids got bored quick just hearing their own voices.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: The karaoke machine arrived as described and on time. My daughter' was excited to receive it for her 3rd birthday. We soon discovered that one of the microphones was not working. I contacted Dime & Nickel to inform them of the problem and they responded promptly. They sent out a new microphone and I had it by the end of the week. Customer service was fantastic!! We now have two working microphones and a happy kid!
customer_reviews.author: Smooth Runner

customer_reviews.title: FEEDBACK!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt matter what angle you hold the mic or which way the speaker is pointed you get feed back all the time. It makes it not even useable. Quality I would put this at a 10 dollar toy you get from the dollar general. Not even walmart quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Durable. Kid-user Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. It's tough. Could be more song built in, but they put their keyboard one and have a lot of noisey fun! These are not MB Quartz speakers, but while eating "sound quality" I chuckled because I am glad it does get louder!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Gaetano Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter approved
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. This was a hit with my granddaughter fir her 3rd B-Day!!! Easy to assemble, loud enough fir her to hear herself as microphones go but not so loud that I need earplugs lol. Love the color and when lights are down we have BEYONCÉ in concert!😄🥰😉
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this microphone. My daughter loves it! She is so exicted. It has a volume control which is so great in a kids toy. My only complaint is that the microphones really don't pick up her singing well unless her mouth is pressed to the mic. But really, she didn't seem to care or noticed.
customer_reviews.author: SJK08

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Shorted out only after 1 day. The sound is so mad very muffled. Waste of money! Very disappointed. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kids! They can both sing together. Fully adjustable. I love that it comes with 2 microphones. Small, compact, and lightweight. I’m so glad I picked this machine for my kids. The volume doesn’t go too loud either, which is perfect. I haven’t hooked up a phone to it yet, but I’m hoping I can use the phone to record from the machine. If not, that would be the only recommendation I would have is to have a way to record.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Landi

customer_reviews.title: big hit
customer_reviews.text: This was an open and use item. No elaborate set up was required. The kids figured out how to use it. They had great fun. Whether it stands the test of time, is still TBD. But it was a big hit on my grandson's birthday. Quality seems to be good.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $50
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids as it was a shareable toy. My kids had to sorta scream in order for there voice to go through the speaker. Also, the sound quality is horrible sounds to robotic. I would expect better quality for $50.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia lemus

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is very poor quality, my iPhone SE's speaker sounds better
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is very poor quality, my iPhone SE's speaker sounds better. The volume of sound captured by the microphone and projected by the speaker is very low, I have a hard time hearing it with music playing from the toy. If this was $20 to $30, I think these shortfalls would be acceptable, but at $50, the price is too steep for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The aux cord is only like 12", so your phone has to be resting on the foot pedals to play anything through the speakers, and the speakers are very quiet when your phone is playing through them. Also, the microphones don't really pick up much sound, you almost have to have the mic in your mouth for the sound to come out of it. Also, the mic holder isn't tight, so it slips down constantly, and the slot for the microphone doesn't hold the microphone in - if you tilt it towards you, the mic slips out.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, came broken. I changed the batteries and still no sound. We were all so excited for this to come and now my kids are left disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent microphone
customer_reviews.text: Good microphone. My 2 year old has to get her lips directly on the mouthpiece for it to pick up her voice... And she's not a quiet kid. I was pretty excited about it and let down. It works ok as long as her mouth is right on the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled and ready to use. Might not matter to some people but for me, it was like a gift from heaven. Haha, but seriously- my girls 3.5 and 1.5 love it. The 3.5 year old feels like a superstar and entertains her little self for a good while on it. The box it came in was not the most fancy, but the product itself is great. Very happy I purchased this. The sound is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title!
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 microphone arrived not two as stated in title. I have two kids and I knew they would fight over this ,icrophome so I looked to buy two. This set advertised that 2 icrophomes came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria s

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids karaoke.
customer_reviews.text: Bright this for my three niece's. I was scared at first cause i thought it would be a flimsy product. But when they opened it they was soooo happy. It really works well. I'm satisfied!! My nieces are 3(twins) and 5years old.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe and kit-kat mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but sound quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to sing, so she's a fan. The second mic is awesome, bc the big brother can join in when he wants without a fight breaking out. You really need to put your lips near or on the mic to actually hear your voice come out of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Karaoke Machine for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great Karaoke Machine for kids. My two year old niece loves this thing. You can hear you voice clearly but you have to get really close the microphone. It lights up and plays music. I would recommend this for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: M Harley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful sounds amazing would defenetly recommend friend to buy this was for family and imsuper in pressed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Cute microphone but you have to speak directly into the mic for it to somewhat work. In hindsight, I've seen much better options for the money. I bought this for $50 and that is way toooooo expensive for what it is. It's all plastic and doesn't work well... Very static and you can barely make out what they are saying through the speakers. I rarely write reviews but felt I had to for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a five year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for a five year old and her sing along playlists! The only thing I wish is that it didn’t have a cord between microphone and stand so she could dance around while she sings.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but totally does not work as a Microphone. In order to even hear your voice and that you have to almost put your lips on it. If I had to do it all over again I would not buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried my 7 year old wouldn't like it because it seems as though it's for toddlers on the box and in the desription, but I tried it out when it came, the height is perfect for all the of my girls 7,6 &4. It's adjustable and awesome. They will love it
customer_reviews.author: Joanna leese

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for kids especially since they don't care about sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fun for kids especially since they don't care about sound quality. Whenever they are "singing" soubd is very distorted. When you hook up through AUX jack the volume is low you can barely hear the music when the kids are singing.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters loved it!! But had to return due to Mic not working and no songs for them to sing along with. It had been a great item if they would had added some kids songs to sing along with instead of music they did not know the words to. Loved the concept just need more upgrade for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Wish the product would have had more known kid songs that came with it. The songs that are already installed on it, are not familiar so it’s very hard for the kids to sing along with it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super gift !!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was for 3 and5 year old ... they LOVED it. The microphone sound is not super clear but it is very entertaining and well made . It is totally worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get my kids to stop playing with this. Every chance they got they were singing their hearts out. They are absolutely obsessed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson and 5 year old granddaughter. They love it! Very entertaining for them and for us.The only drawback with this is the stand does not lock in place and it is kind of flimsy. Hope it hold up as my grandson is very tough on his toys!
customer_reviews.author: KBshaw

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for 3 days but so far it's amazing! It's my son's favorite present! He hasn't stopped using it since receiving it. I can't even get him to go to school in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: doodlebug22

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and use. I attach my iPhone to it and access my 3 year old granddaughters playlist. She loves this microphone and wants me to sing along with her. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend it with great confidence!!
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Fun lights and sounds and cool that you can hook ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun lights and sounds and cool that you can hook up a CD or MP3 player, and the stand can move up and down to adjust for height but the microphone quality is TERRIBLE. If the volume is low enough to almost prevent distortion, then you can't hear the voice through the microphone, but if you turn up the sound it's so distorted you can't clearly hear the voice. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for a 3 year old as it states
customer_reviews.text: This product may be okay for older children but my 3 year old didn’t show interest in it for a couple months. When she started playing with it she broke the blue mic holder right away. A couple days later the pulled the microphone right off the cord. I saw her break both of these pieces and she was not being too forceful. The sound on the machine was good so I’ll give it a one. $50 is a lot of money in our house so I am very disappointed in this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Momofjal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She is constantly having concerts all over the house. Works well with our phones to add music. The only downfall is that the microphones have to be held really close to the mouth for it to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: AYG

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not great. You have to have your mouth right on the microphone to hear your voice . My daughter is two, she’s not so thrilled with it like i thought she’d be . It’s ok, hoping she will grow to like it
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: WORKS VERY POORLY. NO STAR
customer_reviews.text: The sounds given off by this machine are high pitched, garbled, and full of static. Not worth $10 much less $50. This was given as a Christmas gift to 3 grandchildren who were at our home when they opened it and attempted to use it several times. Finally had to put it away to get rid of all the screechy noises. This will be returned. Everyone was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The item was received quickly and in great condition. I read many reviews and agree that ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was received quickly and in great condition. I read many reviews and agree that it is overpriced for what is clearly a young child’s toy. Also it doesn’t get very loud, you have to speak or sing very close (touching) the microphone. The lights; music and applause buttons are fun. This is a Christmas gift and has not been opened yet. I hope it holds up to my 4 and 2 year old granddaughters.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting fun
customer_reviews.text: Our children enjoyed and continue to enjoy this karaoke machine. It is a great value for the price. Easy to operate and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love watching him play with the Karaoke Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding gift for a child. My grandson is almost four and started singing a lot more this year. We love watching him play with the Karaoke Machine. It's a good quality product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters love it but the microphones stopped working after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I'm the Nana who actually purchased this as a Christmas gift. My granddaughters love it but the microphones stopped working after awhile. I contacted the company directly and they were very professional and immediately offered to replace the microphones and any other part that was not functioning properly. The new microphones arrived within 4 business days. Everything is working again and my granddaughters are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Lindoerfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice microphone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this microphone. I wish the aux played louder, you can barely hear the music. Other than that its great for a little singer in the house
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is such poor quality. It says it has 6 songs but that is a joke. They aren't complete songs and not even recognizable. The sound is horrible as well. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The microphone has static. Programmed music is too jazzy for kids. Would be better if it played some tunes known to kids.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. JOhnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any rockstar in the making
customer_reviews.text: This gift is perfect for any kiddo wanting to rock out. Easy to put together, good quality and I love that it comes with two microphones. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids enjoy playing with it.  Easy to put together but not a great construction
customer_reviews.text: For the price this item was a good choice for my grandkids to play with. Cheaply made but got the age group, sufficient for them to enjoy playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Boothe

customer_reviews.title: child friendly
customer_reviews.text: my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter plays with this frequently. if the child likes to perform, this is a great toy especially if the child likes to show off! I think it would be great for the shy child to get them to perform in front of a few people.
customer_reviews.author: Pat LaGala

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: I wish it could get louder but overall it’s a good toy that my child has not lost interest in over a month!
customer_reviews.author: PRTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love how it has two microphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my 5 year old daughter & she loves it. I love how it has two microphones. My 2 year old son & her will sing together on it. It's so fun & easy. They love how they can just hook it up to our iPad & sing along with their favorite songs.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected ? Sending back to order something a little more solid and higher quality for same cost
customer_reviews.author: Tina Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Product is cheap but enjoyed nonetheless by the 4 year old.
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made. One of the microphones barely has sound, and the input opening for plugging in the cords is not made for little kids who are learning to be gentle (it's not very durable). Overall, the 4 year old it was purchased for has enjoyed it, I just don't expect it to hold up very long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kellams

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for her 3rd birthday and she loves it! The day after she got it she woke up, broke out of her bedroom (for the first time ever) and went straight to singing! Her normal routine is to watch a cartoon and then eat breakfast, but she wasn't even interested in cartoons, she just wanted to use her microphone! Made me feel like the best auntie!
customer_reviews.author: snowfawn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality and lots of feedback!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to sing with it (for 5 minutes) but it is painful to listen to because of the poor sound quality and feedback. It is very cheaply made (not worth the $49) and very disappointing. I plugged my iPhone to play music through it and you can barely hear it. She uses it for about 5 minutes and then gets frustrated because of all the feedback and just puts it away. I would not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Najera

customer_reviews.title: Kids absolutely love - bought two
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love - bought two. Only problem the piece that tightens to hold the microphone- does not tighten. Everything else is awesome
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: THe sound was poor. The microphones will be stay on the rack. This was just not a quality gift.
customer_reviews.author: BBS

customer_reviews.title: poor quality - way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughters 3rd bday. In my opinion it's very cheaply made for the price. The microphone stand doesn't stay in place and after 2 days one of the mircrophones completely stopped working. The sound fades in and out really bad and that's with brand new batteries! Not worth the price at all. Planning on returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It came in the manufacturers box, easy to assemble, worked perfect, and batteries included is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cara C

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2and 3 yr old love this! We've hooked up to my phone a few times to play music which was fun and easy but their just as happy singing in it on their own I wouldn't say the microphone is the best but they still loves it just the same
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly but not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Kid friendly and love that it has two microphones. Wish it was louder, plugged in an ipod and you can barely hear it
customer_reviews.author: DairyMom

customer_reviews.title: ... the price i paid for it the quality wasn’t great at all sent it back
customer_reviews.text: For the price i paid for it the quality wasn’t great at all sent it back . It was a Christmas present was disappointed to see it after my child open it
customer_reviews.author: marquette anding

customer_reviews.title: Fun for two!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun but a little pricey. Second mic is great to keep two kids entertained....or entertaining you! Better quality than the cheaper ones. Good for ages 3-5.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but only 1 mike worked.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 6 years old grandchildren were so excited when this arrived yesterday, so it was a great disappointment when one of the mikes barely worked. Its volume was extremely low. The package was not damaged, so it must have been that way from the manufacturer. Everything else was great, though, so I've ordered a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Siblings
customer_reviews.text: A good option for children. My son and daughter can share the spotlight!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Toddler karaoke
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has two mics.... it has a cheap feel but for two young kids it works
customer_reviews.author: patricia63

customer_reviews.title: This toy rocks!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to her granddaughter for her fifth birthday. It was her favorite gift from us. Her eight-year-old sister was able to join her and we had an evening of entertainment. Even the adults were impressed with this toy. The adjustable stand made it nice for the girls to have the microphone at their own level.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Oswald

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied with the kids Karaoke machine we purchased
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the kids Karaoke machine we purchased. Everything is fine, we are impressed with the quality of the product and our grandson loves playing with it. Thanks for contacting us, this is very much appreciated by a supplier who cares about their customers and their purchases. thanks again, Denny & Dona Leonard
customer_reviews.author: Dona Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment!! One mic doesn’t work and sound is very poor!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My 4-year-old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this karaoke machine. The microphones are really light weight. Not the most expensive-seeming plastic, but it has stood up to him playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeburd

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheep. Speakers sound blowen sending product back not worth $50 maybe worth $20 if that
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Yay for 2 mics!
customer_reviews.text: My preschool age children love this! It's perfect for playing around the house. Even my teenage nieces enjoyed plugging in their phone and singing along to songs with the microphones. So glad there are two microphones with this.
customer_reviews.author: NLJ

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the grandkids. It's not too loud either. There is a jack for a smartphone,etc. It will not work with the newer iPhones but there are plenty of devices you can plug into it for a karaoke. Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: 4 yo grand thinks she’s a rock star!b
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grand daughter thinks she’s Carrie Underwood!!loved it- just falls over easy - has pretty good sound for the value
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Edwards

customer_reviews.title: She is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a xmas present for a 7 yr old. She is in love with it ! excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have 2 kids, it's pretty perfect for them. They can both sing at the same time and the speaker works well. Adjustable height and cord included to hook up to my phone for music
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

product_meta.title: L P Kids Karaoke Machine with 2 Microphones and Adjustable Stand, Music Sing Along with Flashing Stage Lights and Pedals for Fun Musical Effects
feature_bullets: TWO KARAOKE MICROPHONE- 1 Sing Along Microphone with an adjustable Stand and additional handheld microphone for your little stars guest singer, Stand measurements: “18.5 inches – 40 inches fully extended
SPEAKER HANDLE & ASSEMBLY- Optional handle to carry the lightweight speaker, perfect for dancing while singing. Easy to assemble & disassemble for quick setup & storage
STREAM MUSIC- connect to your devices through AUX cable (included) & kids can enjoy and sing their favorite songs. Easy to use volume and ON/OFF knob

BUILT-IN ENTERTAINMENT!- Dancing Tunes: take the singing to the next level press Left Foot Pedal to add some tunes & Right Foot Pedal will applaud your children’s talent. Flashing Lights: The built-in multi colored stage lights flash while your little star is singing
SING RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX- 4 AA batteries included & ready to use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,479 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
